resources.string: Clue: Grab some things for dinner but keep an eye on the time.
Clue: this is the second option.
The Mercedes Benz stadium was built in August 2017
The Capital Grille restaurant first opened in Rhode Island in 1990.
Congratulations! You have completed the treasure hunt map

1. The Start Button takes you to the "Clue" page.
 2. There are (at least) TWO clues to solve in the app.
 3. You will be given the first clue.
 4. Locate the location, if you are struggling, use the hint button.
 5. If you found the clue, you will be sent to a solved page.
 6. Click on proceed to do the same steps for the second clue.
 7. Afterwards, you will receive a congratulations message.
